alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 11 at 1:21PM MST until November 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches at Marias Pass, with higher amounts above pass-level. Winds gusting as high as 60 to 80 mph. * WHERE...East Glacier Park Region. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Those in the backcountry should ensure they have appropriate gear and may want to consider alternate travel plans.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
